description: Lio Junior was created by the influence of the good Angolmois energy upon the Matrix in Lio Convoy`s chest. He possesses an innocent, free and wild personality. His tail becomes a Lion Vute Whip, while twin horns extend from his mane to fire Angolmois Ball light spheres. His mane can also become Lion Wings, which he can fly for short distances.
name: Lio Junior
